Body: Someone installed spy-ware and is also tracking my GPS.  I can tell because when I open navigator the location is not where I am. I have driven to the location and someone is sitting in their car.  This same person follows me around town. also when I call my daughter a third party answers phone also so I can't get through to my daughter.I have tried factory reset but the person is still in control of my GPS.  How do I get control back on my phone?
Title: How to remove spy-ware and how to turn off GPS-Tracking?

This same person follows me around town. also when I call my daughter a third party answers phone also so I cant get through to my daughter.I have tried factory reset but the person is still in control of my GPS.  How do I get control back on my phone.
.How do I get spywear and GPS tracking off my phone?
